text: Nattages is a former commune in the Ain department in eastern France. On 1 January 2016, it was merged into the new commune Parves-et-Nattages.Arrêté préfectoral 24 December 2015 It contains the ruins of the Chateau Montbel, the romanesque chapel of Chemillieu and a church rebuilt in the 17th century. ==Population== ==See also== *Communes of the Ain department ==References== Category:Former communes of Ain Category:Populated places disestablished in 2016
title: Nattages
